text:
"Kesmat Wkhayen" () is a Tunisian drama television sitcom, in Tunisian Arabic, directed by Sami Fehri based on a script by Rafika Boujday. It is broadcast on El Hiwar El Tounsi channel during the month of Ramadan 2019 in Tunisia.
Synopsis.
After their father died, Toutou is trying to con his half brother Hafnaoui out of his legal rights to heritage.
